meanings.definition: To remove or get rid of something
meanings.sent1: She eliminates all the clutter from her room before guests come over.
meanings.sent2: The vacuum cleaner eliminates the dust from the carpet.
meanings.sent3: In a magical world, a wave of her wand eliminates all the mess instantly.
meanings.sent4: His hard work eliminates any doubts about his abilities.
meanings.sent5: The superhero's power to eliminate evil forces is unmatched.

meanings.definition: To defeat or surpass someone or something
meanings.sent1: The champion boxer eliminates his opponent in the final round.
meanings.sent2: His innovative idea eliminates the need for manual labor.
meanings.sent3: The clever fox eliminates the competition in the forest race.
meanings.sent4: Her determination eliminates any obstacles in her path to success.
meanings.sent5: The new technology eliminates the old ways of doing things.
